verses.name: Luke 22:7
verses.text: Then came the day of unleavened bread, when the passover must be killed.

verses.name: Luke 22:8
verses.text: And he sent Peter and John, saying, Go and prepare us the passover, that we may eat.

verses.name: Luke 22:9
verses.text: And they said unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare?

verses.name: Luke 22:10
verses.text: And he said unto them, Behold, when ye are entered into the city, there shall a man meet you, bearing a pitcher of water; follow him into the house where he entereth in.
